Audio.Locality: left bank of Rio Uraricuera, just east of BR-174, Roraima
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 6m. Natural calls and one song phrase (at 0.25) given from ground, calls in contact with another individual c.20m away. Open understory of dry seasonally flooded dense thorny gallery forest. Some literature suggests this species does not occur in this region of Brasil.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
